Oh my GOSH! üòÆ

I just discovered how to easily calculate and visualize ALL potential study combinations in a meta-analysis!

In my new blogpost I walk through how to do this in #Rstats via a Graphical display Of Study Heterogeneity (GOSH) plot https://t.co/Dskh8QFwzx

I just saved a data frame with 1M+ rows to CSV with data.table's fwrite() function and it was so fast that I didn't even perceive a pause. fread() also super quick - and does a lot more than import! #rstats #rdatatable
